Author: danielha
Content: Honestly, these tips are not very good. One advises you to work on the startup in your spare time. Something tells me that is not the secret to success.

Author: danielha
Content: There have a few non-US teams in the program. If you stay where you are, you are missing the main benefit of Y Combinator.

Author: mynameishere
Content:
Twitter is _the_ effing stupidest thing I've ever seen in my life. Pollution be its name. Just prevent any submissions from it.

I'm submitting war and peace in hopes of providing more substantial off-topic linkage:
